title: Hosting in Pterodactyl
body: Hosting in Pterodactyl is not supported and Pterodactyl was never meant for webhosting.
You should host NamelessMC alongside Pterodactyl, you can follow [this guide](https://docs.namelessmc.com/installation-vps) on how to do so.
If you are looking to host NamelessMC in a Docker container, see [Nameless-Docker](https://github.com/NamelessMC/Nameless-Docker)
